Description: The Rest on the Flight into Egypt. The Holy Family resting under a large tree in the centre, a sarcophagus next to a river to the left, two pyramids to the right, several architectural blocks and bushes in the foreground, palm trees and Egyptian temples in the background; in an oval Etching
Curator's comments: For a pendant to this print, see S.2686. The top right corner is creased
Bibliographic references: Hollstein / Dutch and Flemish etchings, engravings and woodcuts c.1450-1700 (10)
Weigel 1843 / Suppléments au Peintre-Graveur de Adam Bartsch (undescribed)
Regnault-Delalande 1817 / Catalogue Raisonné des Estampes du Cabinet de M le Comte Rigal (148.10)
Acquisition notes: For the history of the acquisition of the Sheepshanks collection, please see Sheepshanks.1
